title: Teaching practical life skills and competencies
description: Teaching practical life skills and competencies
content:
Scenario: Teaching practical life skills and competencies
    Given Margaret has lifetime of practical knowledge
    And grandchildren need to learn cooking, cleaning, budgeting, self-care
    When Margaret teaches practical skills
    Then the educational_elohim should recognize life skills teaching
    And it should value practical education as essential learning
    And it should track skills development over time
    And life skills teaching should accumulate care tokens
    And Margaret's practical wisdom should be recognized as education
    And informal skill development should be valued alongside academic learning
